beforeStartingText1: : This is an open source software. Please note that the authors are not responsible for any damage caused by this software. Please read the license agreement before clicking 'AGREE'.
beforeStartingText2: By clicking 'AGREE', you are agreeing to the license agreement and admin account will be created. Admin account has all of the permissions of database options.
beforeStartingText3: You can set 'Automatic database backup' option in Settings page. Automatic backup option is highly recommended. If your database is corrupted, restore it with one of the backups. You can restore database with backup in Settings page. If you want to reset the system, you can do it in Settings page. Or simply deleting the main database file will work the same way.
noPasswordMatchTooltip: Please fill in all the fields
noConcentTooltip: Please check 'I agree' on license agreement
usernameTooltip: You can't change the username of admin account
